SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, BOARD_WRITER AS boardWriter, READ_COUNT AS readCount, REG_DATE AS regDate FROM BOARD ORDER BY 1 DESC)B ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
